articles.author: Lizzy Gurdus
articles.title: Two traders share their top international bets as European stocks climb to records - CNBC
articles.description: International markets haven't presented this much opportunity in a while, says Federated Hermes portfolio manager Steve Chiavarone.
articles.content:
U.S. investors shouldn't ignore the global economic comeback, two traders told CNBC.
Overseas markets likely have more upside than domestic stock pickers might think, Steve Chiavarone, a portfolio m… [+1911 chars]

articles.title: Big Match Feature: Villarreal v Man United - SuperSport
articles.description: The 2020/21 UEFA Europa League final brings together Spanish competition stalwarts Villarreal, who have never previously lifted a major European trophy, and 2016/17 winners Manchester United.
